name: Amulet Raider (2022 7DRL)
description:
A fast-action riff on Rogue, using the game mechanics from XQuest (Crystal Quest).

Delve into a dangerous dungeon. Find the cursed amulet. Escape with your life!

Made for the 2022 Seven-day Roguelike Challenge.

Controls: Move with the mouse. Shoot magic missiles while moving using left mouse button. Drink invulnerability potions with either the right mouse button or the Space bar. Other keys: R to retry with a new dungeon; M to toggle the map; Esc to pause. Adjust mouse sensitivity using the Comma and Period keys.
